What are Verus DeFi fractional basket currencies, and how do they work?

Verus DeFi fractional basket currencies are currencies that can be defined by ID owners, backed by one or more asset currencies at a fractional percentage ranging from 5% to 100%. The Verus DeFi protocol ensures that all currency conversions using a particular liquidity pool are solved and priced simultaneously, addressing issues like miner extracted value (MEV) and front-running, while providing fee-based incentives to miners and stakers.
